response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its intrinsic value and potential impact on your endeavors, I estimate its worth to be around $1,000,000 from your perspective. However, considering the exceptional quality and the exclusive nature of this item, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you have the chance to secure this valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
